column4: a long shot could be some type of malfunction on the motherboard. maybe a gnarly powerloss or something.
this has been again and again for last 5-6 months. on both gutsy and hardy
just a couple of minutes ago my box rebooted
it sounds like it could be a power adapter connection problem
when this happens the screen dims and brightens back.. also the battery indicator show's not connected and connects back
and there is a click kinda sound
yes that deffinitely sounds like a bad DC connection on the motherboard. especially if it shows battery then doesnt show it. its possible that it could hurt the battery as well as the heat synch
what could be the solution?
you should have the DC jack checked out at a local computer shop. if its loose it could hurt it bad. they will usually visually inspect it for free. its your best bet id say
thanks.. I had a different power cable.. it worked fine
thats good, just for future notice if it acts up you could really damamge the motherboard so just in case if you have spare time id still get a quick check on it
you mean have a quick check on my motherboard?
no just a visual check of the DC jack. it takes seconds and is usually free
I am not sure about the dc jack.. but the wire from the adapter is slightly cut. that could be a reason ?
yes that could be it, im sure youll be fine, but if it acts up in the future remember my advice
sure thanks a million..
I was worried about the MB being affected

well if nothing else happens you should be fine just make sure you notice these things. something could still be wrong but not apparent at the moment, if you notice the battery not gaining a charge get it checked
its not acting up for now..
ok good, well hope everything is fine now, if you need something you know where to come
sure
